title: Skript最新版的分行符号
author: 热冰
txt_content: 如题，之前使用旧版本的Skript编辑物品lore时||是分行符号，但是最新版的Skript似乎是改了，求最新版Skript的分行符号

replies.author: 中华博
replies.txt_content:
a diamond sword named "name" with lore "lore"
 a diamond sword with lore "line 1" and "line 2"
 a diamond sword with lore "line 1", "" and "line 3"复制代码

lore需要双引号括起来，然后逗号分行
